root.item: <>1</> <>Take Operating Systsm configuration backup for servers which are scheduled under CR</> <>Unix team</>
<>2</> <>Backup team to confirm the latest availability of OS/application data backup</> <>Backup Team</>
<>3</> <>Incase of VM servers, take the snapshot of the server</> <>Unix team/Wintel team</>

<>4</> <>Start the email communication, ensure that all the respective teams are part of email communication. Initiate the bridge and take roll call of teams which are required for the change</> <>Unix team</>
<>5</> <>Disable the monitoring for the servers which are mentioned in the CR. Application team has to co-ordinate with MEM team to disable the probes.</> <>MEM team</>
<>6</> <>Once the probes are disables, application team will stop the application. Application team will provide the servers list if they want to do it in rolling manner.</> <>Application team</>
<>6</> <>Unix team will patch the servers using Ansible.</> <>Unix team</>
<>7</> <>Post patching /Reboot, Unix team will perform post patching validation and inform application team to start/validate the application</> <>Unix team</>
<>8</> <>Application/ DB team will perform the final validation and Start the application on requested servers only.</> <>Application team</>
<>9</> <>Enable the monitoring on the servers</> <>MEM team</>
<>10</> <>Send final communication to all stakeholder </> <>Unix team</>
